app_descript:
Placie

Brief:

Placie is an innovative transportation app designed for the dynamic and evolving commuting landscape of Australia. Catering to those seeking both efficiency and cost-effectiveness in their travel, Placie offers a one-stop interface that integrates real-time comparisons of various transport options. Whether you're looking for the quickest route or the most affordable journey, Placie has you covered, bringing together ride services including taxi and rideshares, public transport, and even airport shuttles. A distinguishing feature is its ability to facilitate multi-modal trips, combining different transport means to tailor the perfect travel experience to your individual needs.

Placie is indeed another striking app brought to you by carsales.com.au, redefining urban mobility with technology at the helm. It's the travel companion that Aussie commuters have been waiting for!
